original_text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister, which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea:
korean_text: 내가 겐그레아 교회의 일꾼으로 있는 우리 자매 뵈뵈를 너희에게 추천하노니

sentences.original_text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 우리 자매 뵈베를 추천하노니

sentences.original_text: which is a servant of the church
